column5: Yeah mon ... I'm fishing  er, where's the ice dude?   Well, you'll just have to keep waiting Roy, tee hee  Sucker?  Hey, I gotta go check the other thread, but someone said ... that you're short Roy ... is it true?  Thorpe, are you short; of course ...  "The Tall Blonde Ones are the first to go"
Yup and when you tall ones go and burn cause "Your closest to da sun" we short crotch closest to the ground will be the last to see it
ah man ... thanks for the laugh!  Good memories!  Pete

Hey Pete, just letting you know the dog teams have finally arrived up here  in Toronto and the latest issue of EA was waiting for me on my door step this morning.  Looks like another winner, so it's time to head off to the reading room for a couple hours
I got mine today as well... WOW... great issue....

Hey all.... Got our ESOX Mag. in the mail today.  Great articles and pictures.  More and more OFC'ers are getting famous.  T.J. surprised me by adding my picture with Marc in a MuskieQuest.com ad. The picture is awsome but the memories are much gooder    Pete, keep up the good work!!

Glad to see my northen neighbors have gotten the latest issue via dog sled hehe and I'm sure it was worth the wait. Told ya it was a good one. This was fun, I could get used to doing this before each issue.  Whopper
Mine arrived up here today as well, good thing we got all that snow .  Haven't had a chance to look at it yet, but I will soon  Maureen
heres the ad we put in for those who don't get the mag... nice and flashy...
Got mine out of the box a few minutes ago...haven't got the "photoz" safety seal off it yet! lol
Seems like all us canucks got our EA Mag today. Now hope to have time to read it before the shows start. LOL I'm just starting my Musky Hunter that I got a week or two ago.

Yippie!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  The dogs have finally arrived.  Good to hear ... seems like Whopper is going to have fun with this in the future.  Thanks Lew, for being the first to let me know it showed.  Monique, thankyou for the kind words ... you look wonderful in the avatar and ad (might I say FAR better-looking than the guy next to you in the ad   ... tee hee). Seriously, thanks.  Maureen and all, thankyou ... I hope you like it ... please report.  I am off to chase deers around in Iowa with dad for a while. You folks keep smilin'  Pete

Mike won a subscription a while back & I got to read it tonight, during intermissions of the stupid hockey game....  I'm fairly sure I recognized the guy in Dip's article, but I just can't put my finger on it....  Great issue, Pete!

"Monique, thankyou for the kind words ... you look wonderful in the avatar and ad (might I say FAR better-looking than the guy next to you in the ad w00t.gif ... tee hee). Seriously, thanks. "   Ya well at least the Boss lent me his wife,More than I say for you  Great issue ,lots of OFNer's in the mag,nice too see such a vast contribution from all over
Yup, the eagle has landed in these parts as well. There are some absolute brutes in this issue! Rather than read it piecemeal, I'll wait till tonight to savour it.
I got my copy in the mail yesterday
Strangely enough I had a copy in the mail too, but I don't have a subscription!  But believe me, I ain't complainin!
Snady, that's yer wages for the month. Nice!

Just got my new issue of Esox Angler in the mail today and haven't put it down since I got home from work. Great read and we will have a new celiberty in our ranks. For those of you that don't automatically get the magazine go and buy it you won't regret it.  Whopper    PS Congrats Raf!
Sounds great.  Just received mine in the mail today as well.  Looks like a lot of good reads ... as soon as I start.
uh oh, what did I do?   thanks Phil.  the mag takes a few days/weeks to get here after the US release, you know, dog sled teams and all.  I'll be sure to grab a copy.
Sounds like you've got an article in the latest issue Raf? Congrats!  Mike
No, you guys see me write.  That's definately not it.
Your buddy really needs to give you a copy!  Whopper
I would give you mine but it has not arrived yet here in Virginia USA.  Art
Thanks for the offer.  I've entered the contest and am feeling lucky.  I'll pick up a copy when they show up on shelves here.
Im waiting for mine... Ive got an ad in there for Muskiequest... I think  lol
Yep TJ it's in there 1/4 page add with a pic of your best half and Mr Thorpe. Page 96  I really like this issue  Whopper

Hi there,  Well thanks for the kind words, Whopper & Rich ... hopefully the dogsleds will arrive to the netherregions soon.  I think it's likely the best effort yet, actually; and awesome issue. Hope you all think so and let us know.  (Here's something I think is over   ... the cold came in here in the night - ice time for good this time, I have a feeling.)  Hasn't arrived in Virginia yet either ... darn dogs.  For those waiting for it to hit newstand, it's Santa's   favorite gift (a subscription) for yourself and others, ya know.  Hey TJ ... both of your ads are in there buddy  ... we weren't   this time.  Pete
Super... I havent told Monique shes in the ad yet!!
OOps ... I didn't let the cat out of the bag   ... it's Whopper's fault. Ha ha  Ad looks great TJ, but next time just have Monique hold the fish and boot Marc outta there.  Pete
Hi,  Just checking in here to see if the dog sleds have arrived in the north yet ... trying to figure this whole mail system thing out.  Pete
Haven't seen mine yet.....

Any doggies in the distance? We're working with a new printer at the magazine ... really want to see how the whole shipping thing from there is working ... so, let me know when see the huge pike on the cover.  Pete
They haven't arrived here in Toronto yet Pete, but I'll let you know when they do.
I havent seen mine yet....  maybe today...
I'm on pins and needles here. This is almost as exciting as waiting for you income tax accessement.

Hi,  Lew, that shot is awesome! Thanks for the report guys ... er, non-report ... good lord it must be a slow buss that heads up there from the printer.  Maybe have to get that buss going about 2 weeks sooner with spring issue -- hold the other copies 'till we know the tax man is at Roy's door.  Pete
Well, we've had some snowfall in southern Ont recently so mail delivery should resume soon.
Don't change nothing Pete this is the only thing that I'm one up on these guys  Whopper
Ha ... too funny Whopper ... yeah, well  I see your point.  Bet they're all wondering about the awesome Euro pike phots, JP's article, Sandy's article (hopefully even my article   ) ...  Pete
This is called 'Pete baiting the hook'.  We'll get ours eventually....
Maina's quite the sucker
